/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the various hues of the buildings and cars. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the urban landscape of Beijing.
